setColorOne(Color) - Static method in class chess.BoardColors
Set the color for one half of the squares.
setColorTwo(Color) - Static method in class chess.BoardColors
Set the color for the second half of the squares.
setDefaultTimes() - Method in class chess.Clocks
Set both clocks to 10 minutes with no increment.

Sets the en passant flag to true.

Set the increment for player one.
setIncrementPlayerTwo(int) - Method in class chess.Clocks
Set the increment for player two.

Set if the game is over or not.

Set if player one is in check.
setIsInCheckP2(boolean) - Static method in class chess.GameLogic

setPawnPromo() - Method in class chess.Move
Sets the pawn promotion flag to true.

Set the time control for player one.
setTimePlayerTwo(int, int) - Method in class chess.Clocks

Creates and brings together all of the GUI elements for the chess application.
